name: Solbone Gorge
description:
Solbone Gorge is my very first attempt at making a game, and was created in a period of 1 month by myself for the Haunted PS1 Summer Spooks game jam. It was developed in Unity 2019 (including PlayMaker, FPS All-In-One, and Volumetric Light Beams addons), using assets created with Blender, Krita, and Substance Painter. All of the models and textures were made by myself, with anything not done by me being listed in the credits section below. 

While the game can be played and completed there are various improvements that I would like to create post-launch. These include:

  1. Character animations for the NPCs.
  2. Improved lighting and audio editing based on feedback.
  3. Replacement of placeholder assets.
  4. Subtitles.
